title: Faeries
description: FIRST BARNES and NOBLE EDITION. 2000 trade paperback, Isaac Asimov (Editor), Martin H. Greenberg (Editor). Faeries-legends about them abound throughout the world. They are evil creatures conjured up to frighten children. Or they are glittering spirits, blessed with wisdom and magic beyond the understanding of mere mortals. They are the unseen, dwelling in subterranean depths, luscious green meadows, or realms caressed by the night's cool shadows. - Amazon
author: Isaac Asimov
